response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $12,000 for this exclusive item. I trust this offer presents an attractive opportunity for both parties and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
